Annotations¶

class mira.core.Annotation(selection, category, score=None)[source]¶

Defines a single annotation.

Parameters

  • selection – The selection associated with the annotation

  • category – The category of the annotation

  • score – A score for the annotation

assign(**kwargs)[source]¶

Get a new Annotation with only the supplied keyword arguments changed.

Return type

Annotation

resize(scale)[source]¶

Get a new annotation with the given uniform scaling.

Return type

Annotation

class mira.core.AnnotationConfiguration(names)[source]¶

A class defining a list of annotation types for an object detection class.

Parameters

names – The list of class names
